welcome_message_body: Welcome to Umm al Qaywayn, a city known for its rich history, beautiful beaches, and traditional charm. We hope you enjoy your time exploring all that our city has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal for exclusive use by Air Arabia.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 3 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The terminal for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Chelsea Tower Bus Station
terminals.description: Located in the Chelsea Tower complex, this bus station offers convenient access to the airport.

terminals.name: EY Bus Station
terminals.description: Located in the EY Tower complex, this bus station offers convenient access to the airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Ras Al Khaimah Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
